text: The 2015 FIFA Women's World Cup qualification – UEFA Group 1 was one of the European qualifying groups for the 2015 FIFA Women's World Cup. In the end, Germany were group winners. The top scorer was Anja Mittag of Germany with 11 goals. title: 2015 FIFA Women's World Cup qualification – UEFA Group 1
